ISSUE.TITLE: how to expand device pool to 100+?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi Firstly, thanks for you great project. I have a question about how to expand device pool to 100+? Suppose one PC has 4 motherboard's USB ports, and each one connects to a usb hub with 7 ports. It can only connect to 28 devices, how we can expand to 100+?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add semaphore workflow for npmjs deployment (#48)
